entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
